actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the United States Grain Standards Act to eliminate the requirement of official weighing at the time of transfer into an export elevator of grain contracted for sale for export from the United States.

summary.text: Amends the United States Grain Standards Act to prohibit, in the absence of a requirement in the sales contract, the official weighing at the time of transfer into an export elevator of grain contracted for sale for export from the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the United States Grain Standards Act to eliminate the requirement of official weighing at the time of transfer into an export elevator of grain contracted for sale for export from the United States.
